title: Chinese intellectuals openly mocking India
comments: I don't see any derision. He could have put it a bit mildly, but this is just cold hard facts.

He's right, but look at China's growth from around 1990s to 2005. Doesn't it resemble a lot like India's growth right now. The next 10 years are crucial for India. It too can grow like China if we focus on economics more than the divisive politics and hate.
